layman_description: Controls if plants and decorations can grow on sloped terrain.
technical_description: Block setting that enables decoration placement on angled surfaces.
player_impact: You'll see more varied plant growth on hills and slopes when this is enabled.

layman_description: Determines what 3D shape the creature or object uses in the game.
technical_description: Defines the entity rendering mode for creatures and objects.
player_impact: Affects how zombies, animals, and supply crates look when you encounter them.

layman_description: How many items you get when you destroy or harvest this block.
technical_description: Sets the quantity of items dropped when block is destroyed.
player_impact: Breaking containers and blocks will give you this many items.

layman_description: How many seconds crafting takes when using this material.
technical_description: Time multiplier applied when item is used in crafting recipes.
player_impact: Using better quality materials makes your crafting faster.

layman_description: Whether your tool disappears or becomes unusable when fully damaged.
technical_description: Controls if items are destroyed at zero durability or become unusable.
player_impact: Some broken tools can be repaired while others are lost forever.

layman_description: Which explosion visual effect appears when something blows up.
technical_description: Selects particle effect for explosion events from the effects library.
player_impact: Different explosions create different smoke, fire, and debris effects.

layman_description: Which item appears in your inventory when you pick up this block.
technical_description: Specifies the inventory item produced when block is collected.
player_impact: Breaking doors and containers gives you different items to carry.

layman_description: Which different color or style appears when you cycle through options.
technical_description: Defines alternate block variations accessible through placement cycling.
player_impact: Lets you choose between colored gun safes, coolers, and decorations.

layman_description: Enables choosing between different colors or styles before placing.
technical_description: Activates the block variant selection mechanism during placement.
player_impact: You can pick which color or style you want before placing the item.

layman_description: How many times you must hit to upgrade to the next building material.
technical_description: Number of tool strikes required to complete block upgrade.
player_impact: Upgrading wood to concrete requires hitting it this many times.

layman_description: Which breaking sound and debris effect plays when destroyed.
technical_description: Specifies the destruction particle and audio effect for blocks.
player_impact: Metal doors and glass windows make different sounds and debris when broken.

layman_description: How far the weapon can hit in front of you.
technical_description: Melee weapon collision detection radius for hit detection.
player_impact: Longer reach means you can hit enemies from farther away.

layman_description: How long this item burns when used in forges or campfires.
technical_description: Duration in game ticks that item provides fuel for burning.
player_impact: Better fuel items keep your forge and campfire running longer.

layman_description: How much damage your tool does to blocks and buildings.
technical_description: Base damage multiplier for tool attacks against block structures.
player_impact: Higher values let you chop wood and break stone faster.

layman_description: How much damage your tool does to zombies and animals.
technical_description: Base damage multiplier for tool attacks against living entities.
player_impact: Higher values kill zombies and animals with fewer hits.

layman_description: Which visual effect appears when this zombie or object is destroyed.
technical_description: Particle effect spawned when entity reaches zero health.
player_impact: Dead zombies and destroyed cars create different smoke and debris clouds.

layman_description: How much scrap iron you get from scrapping or destroying this.
technical_description: Quantity of scrap iron resource awarded on block destruction.
player_impact: Breaking metal objects gives you scrap iron for crafting and forging.

layman_description: How much experience you gain when repairing this item.
technical_description: Experience multiplier applied when item is repaired at a workbench.
player_impact: Repairing better weapons gives you more skill points.

layman_description: How many electrical parts you get from scrapping or destroying this.
technical_description: Quantity of electrical parts resource awarded on block destruction.
player_impact: Breaking electronics gives you parts needed for turrets and traps.

layman_description: How much of your hairstyle shows when wearing this helmet or hat.
technical_description: Defines which portions of player hair remain visible with equipped headgear.
player_impact: Some helmets hide your hair completely while hats leave it visible.

layman_description: How effective this tool is at gathering resources from plants and crops.
technical_description: Harvesting multiplier when tool is used on plant-based resources.
player_impact: Better harvesting tools give you more crops when farming.

layman_description: How fast the zombie moves during different parts of its attack cycle.
technical_description: Sequence of movement speed multipliers for entity animation phases.
player_impact: Zombies speed up and slow down as they chase and attack you.

layman_description: Which sound plays when your weapon is too damaged to fire.
technical_description: Audio clip played when weapon degradation prevents firing.
player_impact: You'll hear a clicking sound when your gun needs repair.

layman_description: How far from center your melee swing still counts as a glancing hit.
technical_description: Outer boundary of reduced damage zone for grazing attacks.
player_impact: Hits near the edge of your swing do reduced damage.

layman_description: How close to center your melee swing must be for full damage.
technical_description: Inner boundary where full damage transitions to grazing damage.
player_impact: Accurate swings that connect near the center do more damage.

layman_description: How far away you can use this weapon or tool effectively.
technical_description: Maximum effective distance for weapon or tool interactions.
player_impact: Longer range lets you hit enemies and harvest blocks from farther away.

layman_description: Which scream or noise the creature makes when killed.
technical_description: Audio clip played when entity health reaches zero.
player_impact: Different zombies and animals make unique death sounds.

layman_description: Which pain noise the creature makes when damaged.
technical_description: Audio clip played when entity takes non-fatal damage.
player_impact: You'll hear different grunts and screams when hitting various enemies.

layman_description: What direction your weapon swings when you attack.
technical_description: Starting angle of weapon arc during melee animation.
player_impact: Affects whether you swing sideways, overhead, or at an angle.

layman_description: How wide an arc your weapon sweeps through when attacking.
technical_description: Total angular range covered by melee weapon during swing.
player_impact: Wider swings can hit multiple enemies at once.

layman_description: Whether edge hits do less damage than center hits.
technical_description: Enables distance-based damage scaling for melee attacks.
player_impact: Precise aim with your melee weapon becomes more rewarding.

layman_description: What type of vehicle part this is.
technical_description: Categorizes vehicle parts for assembly and crafting requirements.
player_impact: You need different part types to build and repair vehicles.

layman_description: What the plant grows into during the next growth stage.
technical_description: Specifies the successor block for plant growth progression.
player_impact: Your crops and trees transform into this as they mature.

layman_description: How heavy the creature is for physics and knockback.
technical_description: Entity weight used in collision and ragdoll calculations.
player_impact: Heavier zombies are harder to knock back with explosions.

layman_description: How many seconds before you can pick up this block again.
technical_description: Cooldown timer in seconds before block can be collected.
player_impact: You must wait this long after placing before picking it back up.

layman_description: Which types of ammunition work with this weapon.
technical_description: List of compatible magazine and ammunition items for weapon.
player_impact: Only bullets and magazines on this list can be loaded.

layman_description: Which fire, smoke, or effect animation plays continuously.
technical_description: Persistent particle system attached to active block.
player_impact: Campfires show flames and forges create glowing embers.

layman_description: Where the fire or smoke effect appears relative to the block.
technical_description: Position offset for particle effects from block center.
player_impact: Adjusts whether flames appear at the top, center, or sides.

layman_description: Which roar or attack noise plays when the enemy strikes.
technical_description: Audio clip played during entity attack animation.
player_impact: You'll hear threatening sounds when zombies swing at you.

layman_description: How damaged the block must be to show visible cracks.
technical_description: Health threshold for transitioning to damaged appearance state.
player_impact: Blocks show cracks and damage as you hit them.

layman_description: Which roar or growl the creature makes when spotting you.
technical_description: Audio clip played when entity detects and aggros player.
player_impact: You'll hear warning sounds when zombies notice you.

layman_description: Which idle noises the creature randomly makes while wandering.
technical_description: Audio clip pool for entity ambient vocalizations.
player_impact: You'll hear groaning and shuffling from nearby zombies.

layman_description: Which body parts are censored for different regional versions.
technical_description: Defines gore visibility level for regional content restrictions.
player_impact: Some versions hide blood and dismemberment effects.

layman_description: Which sound plays when you stop firing your weapon.
technical_description: Audio clip triggered when sustained weapon fire ceases.
player_impact: Machine guns make a wind-down noise when you release the trigger.

layman_description: Which quest series this completes for tracking your progress.
technical_description: Identifier for quest completion tracking in progression system.
player_impact: Completing this quest counts toward your achievement progress.

layman_description: How the controller trigger feels when firing on PlayStation.
technical_description: Defines haptic feedback profile for DualSense adaptive triggers.
player_impact: Different weapons create unique trigger resistance when firing.

layman_description: Which alternate appearance textures the zombie can randomly use.
technical_description: List of alternative material files for entity visual variation.
player_impact: Zombies of the same type look slightly different from each other.

layman_description: Which curious noise the creature makes when investigating something.
technical_description: Audio clip played when entity enters search or investigate state.
player_impact: Zombies make sniffing sounds when looking for you.

layman_description: Which mechanical noise plays when the trap activates.
technical_description: Audio clip triggered at beginning of trap activation sequence.
player_impact: You'll hear motors starting when blade traps turn on.

layman_description: Which mechanical noise plays when the trap deactivates.
technical_description: Audio clip triggered at end of trap activation sequence.
player_impact: You'll hear motors stopping when blade traps turn off.

layman_description: Which severed head appearance appears when you decapitate this zombie.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for head dismemberment events.
player_impact: Different zombie types leave different severed heads.

layman_description: How far the zombie can leap when jumping at you.
technical_description: Maximum horizontal distance for entity jump attacks.
player_impact: Some zombies can jump over obstacles or gaps to reach you.

layman_description: Which clicking sound plays when trying to fire without ammo.
technical_description: Audio clip played when weapon is fired with empty magazine.
player_impact: You'll hear dry firing when you run out of bullets.

layman_description: Which construction noise plays when upgrading the block.
technical_description: Audio clip played during block upgrade completion.
player_impact: Different materials make hammering or welding sounds when upgrading.

layman_description: Which walking animation style the creature uses.
technical_description: Selects locomotion animation set for entity movement.
player_impact: Affects whether zombies shamble, sprint, or crawl toward you.

layman_description: What harmful effect touching this block gives you.
technical_description: List of debuffs applied when player contacts block damage zone.
player_impact: Touching fire or hazards burns you and drains your health.

layman_description: Where the harmful area is positioned relative to the block.
technical_description: Spatial offset for block damage collision zone.
player_impact: Determines exactly where you take damage near hazardous blocks.

layman_description: How large the harmful area around this block is.
technical_description: Dimensions of block damage collision detection zone.
player_impact: Larger hazard zones make it harder to avoid taking damage.

layman_description: Which severed forearm appears when you cut off this zombie's lower left arm.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for left lower arm dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different forearm pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: Which severed upper arm appears when you cut off this zombie's left shoulder.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for left upper arm dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different upper arm pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: Which severed forearm appears when you cut off this zombie's lower right arm.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for right lower arm dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different forearm pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: Which severed upper arm appears when you cut off this zombie's right shoulder.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for right upper arm dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different upper arm pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: What additional effect touching this block gives you.
technical_description: Secondary debuffs applied alongside primary damage effects.
player_impact: Some hazards slow you down in addition to damaging you.

layman_description: Where the additional effect area is positioned relative to the block.
technical_description: Spatial offset for secondary buff collision zone.
player_impact: Determines where you get slowed or affected by secondary hazards.

layman_description: How large the additional effect area around this block is.
technical_description: Dimensions of secondary buff collision detection zone.
player_impact: Controls how far from hazards you need to stay to avoid being slowed.

layman_description: Which breaking noise plays when you fully destroy this.
technical_description: Audio clip played when item or block durability reaches zero.
player_impact: Different materials make distinct destruction sounds when broken.

layman_description: Which severed shin appears when you cut off this zombie's lower left leg.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for left lower leg dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different leg pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: Which severed thigh appears when you cut off this zombie's upper left leg.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for left upper leg dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different thigh pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: Which severed shin appears when you cut off this zombie's lower right leg.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for right lower leg dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different leg pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: Which severed thigh appears when you cut off this zombie's upper right leg.
technical_description: Specifies gore asset for right upper leg dismemberment.
player_impact: Different zombies leave different thigh pieces when dismembered.

layman_description: What color this block appears on your map.
technical_description: Minimap color values for block representation in map view.
player_impact: Different terrain and buildings show as different colors on your map.

layman_description: Whether this object automatically adjusts to ground slopes.
technical_description: Enables ground-conforming placement for vehicle collision.
player_impact: Vehicles and blocks sit level on the ground instead of floating.

layman_description: Which footstep sounds play when the creature walks.
technical_description: Selects footstep audio category for entity movement.
player_impact: Different zombies make heavy boots, bare feet, or animal footstep sounds.

layman_description: Which group this creature belongs to for friend or foe identification.
technical_description: Defines allegiance category for enemy detection and targeting.
player_impact: Determines whether creatures attack you, each other, or are friendly.

layman_description: Whether you get an empty jar back after consuming this food or drink.
technical_description: Enables container item return after consumption.
player_impact: Drinking jarred items returns empty jars to your inventory.

layman_description: How the controller trigger feels when firing on Xbox.
technical_description: Defines haptic feedback profile for Xbox impulse triggers.
player_impact: Different weapons create unique rumble when firing.

layman_description: Whether this object is purely decorative with no other function.
technical_description: Marks block as non-functional decoration for placement rules.
player_impact: Decorative items can be placed on slopes and irregular surfaces.

layman_description: Whether this creature is hostile and will attack you.
technical_description: Flags entity as enemy for targeting and combat systems.
player_impact: Determines if something attacks you on sight or ignores you.

layman_description: Whether the creature's movement matches its animation exactly.
technical_description: Enables animation-driven movement instead of code-driven locomotion.
player_impact: Makes zombie movements look more realistic and grounded.

layman_description: Whether the creature plays a falling animation when killed.
technical_description: Enables death animation playback before ragdoll physics.
player_impact: Some zombies dramatically fall down while others instantly collapse.

layman_description: Whether this weapon has a special charged attack animation.
technical_description: Enables power attack animation during charged strikes.
player_impact: Holding the attack button triggers a slower but stronger swing.

layman_description: What type of quest this is in your journal.
technical_description: Quest classification for menu organization and filtering.
player_impact: Helps you sort between regular quests, challenges, and treasure hunts.

layman_description: Where to find the quest's full story text in the game files.
technical_description: Localization key for quest description text lookup.
player_impact: Determines what text you read in your quest journal.

layman_description: Which picture appears next to the quest in your journal.
technical_description: Menu icon identifier for quest list display.
player_impact: Helps you quickly identify quest types by their icon.

layman_description: Where to find the quest's title in the game files.
technical_description: Localization key for quest name text lookup.
player_impact: Determines the quest title you see in your journal.

layman_description: How many mechanical parts you get from scrapping or destroying this.
technical_description: Quantity of mechanical parts resource awarded on block destruction.
player_impact: Breaking machinery gives you parts needed for crafting and repairs.

layman_description: Where to find the quest's short description in the game files.
technical_description: Localization key for quest subtitle text lookup.
player_impact: Shows you a brief quest summary in your journal.

layman_description: How much damage this does to zombies and animals when it hits.
technical_description: Base damage value for entity-targeting attacks.
player_impact: Higher values kill enemies faster with each hit.

layman_description: Which main category this creature belongs to for organization.
technical_description: Hierarchy classification for entity grouping and inheritance.
player_impact: Groups similar creatures together for game rules and spawning.

layman_description: Which mechanical sound plays when you reload the weapon.
technical_description: Audio clip triggered during reload animation sequence.
player_impact: Different weapons make distinct clicking and sliding sounds when reloading.

layman_description: How you finish the quest and claim your reward.
technical_description: Defines quest completion trigger mechanism.
player_impact: Most quests require returning to the quest giver to finish.

layman_description: Whether you can do this quest multiple times for more rewards.
technical_description: Enables quest reset after completion for repeated attempts.
player_impact: Repeatable quests can be accepted again after finishing them.

layman_description: How much scrap plastic you get from scrapping or destroying this.
technical_description: Quantity of polymer resource awarded on block destruction.
player_impact: Breaking plastic items gives you material for crafting and forging.

layman_description: Whether your aim jumps upward after each shot from recoil.
technical_description: Enables crosshair displacement after firing for recoil simulation.
player_impact: Your aim bounces up after shooting and must be re-centered.

layman_description: What tracking icon appears on your compass for this creature or player.
technical_description: Defines compass marker type for entity navigation display.
player_impact: Shows party members, enemies, and animals on your compass.

layman_description: How much zombie-attracting scent you create when using this.
technical_description: Heat value generated during item activation or consumption.
player_impact: Using loud or smelly items attracts nearby zombies to your location.

layman_description: How much damage vehicles take when hitting this block.
technical_description: Damage multiplier applied to vehicle collision events.
player_impact: Some blocks damage your vehicle more than others when you hit them.

layman_description: How much forged steel you get from scrapping or destroying this.
technical_description: Quantity of forged steel resource awarded on block destruction.
player_impact: Breaking steel structures gives you high-quality building material.

layman_description: How many reward options you can choose from when completing the quest.
technical_description: Number of selectable rewards presented at quest completion.
player_impact: You pick your favorite reward from this many options.

layman_description: How much damage this does to blocks and buildings when it hits.
technical_description: Base damage value for block-targeting attacks.
player_impact: Higher values let you break through walls and doors faster.

layman_description: How much bigger or smaller this creature is compared to normal.
technical_description: Size multiplier applied to entity model dimensions.
player_impact: Some zombies spawn larger and tougher or smaller and weaker.
